guts.calculators
Class SpeedCalculator

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      guts.calculators.SpeedCalculator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Observer
public class SpeedCalculator
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer

Does all the speed calculation between to Location objects. It therefor keeps an history of the last known poisition and uses the new pased object to do it's math. It then saves the new object as the last known position, and so on...

Constructor Summary
SpeedCalculator()
           
 
Method Summary
 double calculateSpeed(Location current)
          Returns the current speed in km/h based on the last two locations and their related timestamps
 double getSpeed()
          Returns the last calculated speed
 void reset()
          Reset the Speed calculator, so that calculateSpeed will return 0.0 the next time it's called, because lastKnownLocation is reset to null
 void reset(Location start)
          Resets the Speed calculator and takes the start param as it's first lastKnownLocation
 void update(java.util.Observable t, java.lang.Object o)
          Calculates the speed and sets the location to the lastKnownLocation attribute.

Method Detail

calculateSpeed

public double calculateSpeed(Location current)
Returns the current speed in km/h based on the last two locations and their related timestamps

Parameters:
current - The current location, will be used as last location the next time the method is called
Returns:
The current speed in km/h

reset

public void reset(Location start)
Resets the Speed calculator and takes the start param as it's first lastKnownLocation

Parameters:
start - Will be set as the lastKnownPosisition

reset

public void reset()
Reset the Speed calculator, so that calculateSpeed will return 0.0 the next time it's called, because lastKnownLocation is reset to null

See Also:
calculateSpeed(guts.entities.Location)

update

public void update(java.util.Observable t,
                   java.lang.Object o)
Calculates the speed and sets the location to the lastKnownLocation attribute. It then notifies it's observers that speed has changed.

Specified by:
update in interface java.util.Observer
Parameters:
t - The observable that caused the update
o - The variable the observable passed to the obeserver

getSpeed

public double getSpeed()
Returns the last calculated speed

Returns:
The current speed
